p: For NMR spectroscopy of formed sugar esters, 30 mg of purified sample 3 from the flash chromatography was dissolved in 0.6 mL CDCl 3/d6-acetone (4: 1, by vol.). 1D 1H NMR spectroscopy and 2D 1H- 1H correlation spectroscopy (COZY), 1H- 13C heteronuclear single quantum coherence spectroscopy (clip-HSQC Enthart et al., 2008), and heteronuclear multiple-bond correlation spectroscopy (HMBC) were performed as described in Siebenhaller et al. ( 2016).
